data.eml:eml: Taxonomic clarification of the Eumicrotremus asperrimus species complex (Teleostei: Cyclopteridae) in the eastern North Pacific

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stevenson, Duane E., Mecklenburg, Catherine W., Kai, Yoshiaki (2017): Taxonomic clarification of the Eumicrotremus asperrimus species complex (Teleostei: Cyclopteridae) in the eastern North Pacific. Zootaxa 4294 (4): 419-435, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4294.4.2
